title: Crush the Protagonist Into Dregs - Novel Updates
tags: Alternate World   Ancient China   Broken Engagement   Clever Protagonist   Episodic   Farming   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Reincarnation   Romantic Subplot   Royalty   System Administrator   Transmigration   World Hopping   World Travel
author: Lan Gui   兰桂
description:
So what about transmigrating into the antagonist’s body?

Quickly and easily, having a merry time, while crush anyone who doesn’t have eyes!

[The Heir becomes the son of a peasant.]

What do you do if your fiancee is having an affair with your adopted brother? And your parents were bias towards him? 

Tao Rui: Go back and recognize your peasant parents.

[Showbiz Tragedy Movie Emperor]

The protagonist is always sucking my luck away? 

Tao Rui: Swallow the luck sucking system, and give the protagonist a taste of bad luck!

Face-slapping through time and space!


This is a sequel to the novel 'The Gangster Took the Scumbag Script'>
